message.content:
To solve the task, we need to identify the specific line item in the income statement that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is commonly referred to as "Depreciation."

Following the provided income statement in the problem:

```plaintext
| Account                  | Amount      | Date       |
|-------------------------|-------------|------------|
| Main Business Revenue    | 6920513.79 | 2024-01-31 |
| Total Revenue            | 6920513.79 | 2024-01-31 |
| Cost of Goods Sold       | 5580000.00 | 2024-01-31 |
| Total Cost               | 5580000.00 | 2024-01-31 |
| Gross Profit             | 1340513.79 | 2024-01-31 |
| Administrative Expenses   | 1241966.86 | 2024-01-31 |
| Selling Expenses          | 630420.28  | 2024-01-31 |
| Depreciation             | 45742.50   | 2024-01-31 |
| Financial Expenses        | 748774.91  | 2024-01-31 |
| Total Expenses            | 2666904.55 | 2024-01-31 |
| Interest Income           | 2566.71    | 2024-01-31 |
| Profit Before Tax        | -1323824.05| 2024-01-31 |
| Tax Expense              | 346025.72  | 2024-01-31 |
| Net Profit               | -1669849.77| 2024-01-31 |
```

We can see that the line item "Depreciation" has a value of 45742.50. This is what we're looking for, as it represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life.

Now, let's format the solution according to the required JSON structure:

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45742.50'} }
```
